plentry.pd: (66): Baseline video codec profile, typically used for video calls on mobile devices.
(77): Main video codec profile, typically used on mainstream electronic devices such as MP4 players, portable video players, PSP, and iPad.
(100): High (default) video codec profile, typically used for high-resolution live streaming or TV scenarios.
(66): Baseline video codec profile, typically used for video calls on mobile devices.
